error.message: Class Drupal\price\Event\NumberFormatDefinitionEvent extends deprecated class Symfony\Component\EventDispatcher\Event: since Symfony 4.3, use "Symfony\Contracts\EventDispatcher\Event" instead
Class Drupal\price\Event\NumberFormatEvent extends deprecated class Symfony\Component\EventDispatcher\Event: since Symfony 4.3, use "Symfony\Contracts\EventDispatcher\Event" instead

Parameter $number_formatter_factory of method Drupal\price\Plugin\Field\FieldFormatter\PriceModifiedDefaultFormatter::__construct() has typehint with deprecated interface Drupal\price\NumberFormatterFactoryInterface: Replaced by CurrencyFormatterInterface.
The "price.number_formatter_factory" service is deprecated. You should use the 'price.currency_formatter' service instead. See http://drupal.org/node/the-change-notice-nid
Value of core_version_requirement: ^8.8 || ^9 is not compatible with the next major version of Drupal core. See https://drupal.org/node/3070687.
